      • getAndRemoveSpeciesAt

        public Animal getAndRemoveSpeciesAt(int x,
                           int y)
        Removes and returns the animal at the coordinates (x, y), if the cell is unlocked.
        Parameters:
        x - Coordinate to get from.
        y - Coordinate to get from.
        Returns:
        An animal if the cell is unlocked, else it returns null.

      • moveSpecies

        public boolean moveSpecies(int currentX,
                  int currentY,
                  int newX,
                  int newY)
        Moves an animal from (currentX, currentY) to (newX, newY), if that cell is unlocked and there is nothing else on that cell.
        Parameters:
        currentX - Current x coordinate.
        currentY - Current y coordinate.
        newX - Coordinate which the object want to move to.
        newY - Coordinate which the object want to move to.
        Returns:
        True if successfully moved, else false.

      • setSpeciesAt

        public boolean setSpeciesAt(int x,
                   int y,
                   Animal animal)
        Sets animal at coordinates (x, y) if the cell is unlocked and is not occupied, else it does nothing.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate which the animal want to be spawned.
        y - The y coordinate which the animal want to be spawned.
        animal - The animal which will be spawned.
        Returns:
        True if successfully spawned, else false.

      • containsAnimal

        public boolean containsAnimal(int x,
                     int y)
        Returns true if the cell at coordinates (x, y) is unlocked and contains an animal.
        Parameters:
        x - The coordinate to be checked.
        y - The coordinate to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the cell at coordinates (x, y) is unlocked and contains an animal.
